title: Wind Farm Site Access Road Planning
description: A civil engineer must plan the route for an access road to a remote wind farm site, minimizing environmental impact and cost.

tasks.description: Analyze topographical maps and satellite imagery to identify potential road corridors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent proposes three potential routes from the main highway to the site.

tasks.description: Evaluate each route for factors like grade, water crossings, and proximity to sensitive habitats.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent scores each route based on the evaluation criteria.

tasks.description: Estimate the construction cost for the most promising route.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a preliminary cost estimate for the recommended route.

tasks.description: Recommend the optimal route and provide a justification.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects the route that best balances cost and environmental impact.
